attributes.action: Consider the depth of public feeling against bonus payments by the banking sector
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We feel that the scale of bonus payments which are being proposed by banking organisations, are an insult to UK citizens, especially those who have experienced the effects of the recession. We feel that we have been forced to bail out miss managed financial institutions, who, instead of looking to atone for their gross misconduct, seek to line their pockets further, regardless of the pain and hardship they have caused.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
